QUESTION
ASSALA-O-ALAIKUM  MASALA TALAQ HE----MERE EK DOST NE AAJ SE 03 YEARS PEHLE APNI WIFE KO ...MENE TUJHE TALAQ DI, ME NE JUJHE TALAQ DIA, ME NE TUJHE TALAQ DIA, DO GAWAHON KI MOJOODGI ME KAHA ...PHIR KISI MOLANA KE KEHNE ME AAKER RUJOO KARLIA ,IS KE 01 YEARS BAAD YAHI AMAL DUBARA DOHRAYA ...PHIR KISI NE MASHORA DIA KI TALAQ NAHI HUWI....LEKIN AAJ 02/03 YEARS BAAD LOG KEHTE HEN KI TALAQ HOGAI....SHARAI MASALA BATADEN KI HOGAI YA NAHI..

ANSWER
